message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.CR 

The paper discusses a distributed hosting platform for data stream processing applications that combines dedicated and opportunistic network resources. This topic falls under the categories of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC), Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI), Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS), Systems and Control (cs.SY), and Cryptography and Security (cs.CR). However, since the paper primarily focuses on the design and management of the network resources for stream processing, cs.DC and cs.NI are the most likely categories. The use of decentralized algorithms for resource allocation also suggests the relevance of cs.DS and cs.SY. Finally, the paper briefly mentions the importance of ensuring security and reliability, which aligns with the cs.CR category.
